title: Bugsplat reports when opening client
body:

000000.020|   OKAY| Working Set Size: 11MiB Peak: 11MiB   Pagefile Usage: 9MiB Peak: 9MiB   Private Usage: 9MiB
000000.020|   OKAY| Paged Pool Usage: 0MiB Peak: 0MiB   Non-Paged Pool Usage: 0MiB Peak: 0MiB
000000.020|   OKAY| Committed Total: 132MiB   Committed Image: 113MiB   Committed Mapped: 13MiB   Committed Private: 5MiB   Reserved Total: 64MiB   Reserved Image: 0MiB   Reserved Mapped: 22MiB   Reserved Private: 42MiB   Free Total: 3898MiB   Limit: 4095MiB   Largest Free: 2028MiB   Region Count: 488
000000.020|   OKAY| Page Fault Count: 2K
000001.158|  ERROR| Crash Occurred


those are the game logs i get when i open the league client. I believe this is happening due to the fact that i think i accidentally deleted old files from the legacy client but i want to know how to make it so it doesn't keep sending me bug splat errors every time i open the client. The client still opens and allows me to log in but the bug splat errors are annoying. Any fix?

replies.body: I can't see for myself what's going wrong in those game logs, but typically bugsplats happen when certain files don't interact in the way they're meant to causing a crash. Check out the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as they can help you make sure all of your drivers and game files are working with each other so the game can run correctly.
i went into my graphics card settings and reset it to factory default, it seemed to have fixed the issue.Thank you
